titleStmt.title: [Here begynneth a lytell geste of Robyn hode]
Little gest of Robin Hood.

notesStmt.note: Title and imprint from STC which gives publication date as: 1506?-1509.
In Goes's 95 mm. textura with w² having serif curling down on the left--STC.
Identified as STC 13687 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
